item.title: NBA Gambling Woes
item.description: Our sportsbook open and closed around the NBA Playoffs (picture by CBS Sports). There comes a time in oneâ€™s life that the lure of betting tempts the brain and gives one the feeling of accomplishment or entertainment. For some, that comes with turning of age and seeing others do it. For some, it can be the location of a vacation such as Las Vegas. For me, the lure never came.
